data.going: Abandoned After an inspection with two stewards, clerk of course and head groundsman the decision was made to abandon the meeting due to unsafe and false areas of ground due to excessive rain. (GoingStick: 4.8 on Sunday at 12:30)
data.weather: 14mm rain overnight and up to 8.45 Monday. Forecast further 3-4mm Monday morning then dry.
data.other: I am very sorry that the meeting has been abandoned due to unsafe ground. Any questions please give me a call on 07767 80220. David.
data.rail: Fresh strip ground whole way around on hurdle course Race 1 plus 113 yards Race 2 plus 141 yards Race 3 plus 148 yards Race 4 plus 141 yards Race 5 plus 170 yards Race 6 plus 185 yards
